## Feature Summary
Provide a clear and concise summary of the feature or change you are requesting.

Example:
“Add duty activity tracking to businesses to show if at least one employee is on duty.”


## Problem This Solves
Explain the problem, limitation, or pain point this feature addresses.

Why is this needed?
What is currently missing or inefficient?


## Proposed Solution
Describe your ideal solution in detail.
This does not have to be technical, but it should be clear.

Explain:
- How it should work
- Who interacts with it
- When it triggers
- Any rules or restrictions you expect


## Alternative Solutions (Optional)
If you have other ideas or possible approaches, list them here.


## Impact & Priority
Who does this feature affect?

- [ ] Civilians
- [ ] Businesses
- [ ] Factions
- [ ] Law Enforcement
- [ ] EMS
- [ ] Staff
- [ ] Everyone

How important is this feature?
- [ ] Critical (blocks gameplay or operations)
- [ ] High (major quality-of-life or balance improvement)
- [ ] Medium (useful but not urgent)
- [ ] Low (nice to have)


## Scope & Complexity (Your Best Guess)
This helps us evaluate feasibility. It’s okay if you’re unsure.

- [ ] Small (minor UI or logic change)
- [ ] Medium (new logic, integrations, or permissions)
- [ ] Large (new system, database changes, or major refactor)
- [ ] Unknown


## Dependencies or Related Systems
List any systems, scripts, or areas that may be involved.

Examples:
- qb-core duty system
- ox_inventory
- ps-dispatch
- Business management panel
- txAdmin
- Discord integration


## Risks or Concerns (Optional)
List any possible concerns you foresee:
- Abuse potential
- Performance impact
- Balance concerns
- Conflicts with existing systems


## Additional Context / References
Attach screenshots, diagrams, mockups, examples from other servers, or links if applicable.


## Checklist (Must Be Completed)
Please confirm the following before submitting:
- [ ] I searched existing issues to avoid duplicates
- [ ] This is not a bug report
- [ ] I clearly described the problem and proposed solution
- [ ] I understand this may be accepted, modified, deferred, or declined
